kulami.game.board

Class BoardParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.game.board.BoardParser

  •  class BoardParser
extends java.lang.Object
    BoardParser is a class that contains static methods to parse the textual representation of a Kulami board used by the Kulami server.
    Author:
    gordon

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.regex.Pattern boardPattern 
      private static java.lang.String boardRegex 
      private static java.lang.String fieldRegex 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private BoardParser()
      BoardParser is not meant to be instantiated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static void getBoard(java.lang.String boardCode, Board board)
      This method parses the boardCode and configures the Board given as its second parameter.
      (package private) static void getMarbles(java.lang.String boardCode, GameMap gameMap)
      This method parses the boardCode and places the marbles accordingly on the given GameMap.
      private static boolean isCorrect(java.lang.String boardCode)
      Checks whether the argument is likely to hold a legal board code.

    • Method Detail

      • getBoard

        static void getBoard(java.lang.String boardCode,
            Board board)
              throws IllegalBoardCode
        This method parses the boardCode and configures the Board given as its second parameter.
        Parameters:
        boardCode - a 200-character board code
        board - Board object to be configured
        Throws:
        IllegalBoardCode

      • getMarbles

        static void getMarbles(java.lang.String boardCode,
              GameMap gameMap)
                throws IllegalBoardCode
        This method parses the boardCode and places the marbles accordingly on the given GameMap.
        Parameters:
        boardCode - 200-character board code
        gameMap - GameMap object on which marbles will be placed.
        Throws:
        IllegalBoardCode

      • isCorrect

        private static boolean isCorrect(java.lang.String boardCode)
        Checks whether the argument is likely to hold a legal board code.
        Parameters:
        boardCode - 200-character board code
        Returns:
        true if boardCode is a 200-character board code
